entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
